content: कांचिः, --ची {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [कांच् बंधने इनि] {@--1@} A woman's girdle or zone furnished with small tinkling bells or other ornaments; एतावता नन्वनुमेयशोभि कांचीगुणस्थानमनिंदितायाः <ls>Ku. 1. 37</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 55</ls>; <ls>Me. 28</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 82</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 43.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of an ancient city in the south of India, regarded as one of the sacred cities of the Hindus; (for the names of the seven cities, see अवंति).
